Name: Sergeant RocketByte
Description: Hailing from the pixelated frontiers of the WebtrES club, Sergeant RocketByte is a legendary cyber-soldier known for his unwavering courage and red-black visor that strikes fear into the hearts of adversaries. His rocket-powered limbs were forged in the aftermath of a daring mission, granting him unrivaled agility and the ability to execute aerial maneuvers that defy gravity. Outfitted with a rugged combat box chassis and tactical buttons that have seen many virtual battles, he stands as a bulwark against the chaos of the digital realm, always ready to lead his pixelated platoon into the fray.
